title: The Consultation
creator_credit: Frances McGivern, AFTRS and Liz Crosby
brief_description: Betty (Leverne McDonnell) sees Larry (Matthew Crosby) across a bar. There is mutual interest, engagement, excitement, and of course, attraction. A stylish, erotic drama with a twist in the tale; a romance for the times we live in.
